tool_description: Portfolio  & whales  multi-chain tracker. Get Net worth, Coins  & NFTs on wallets, History, Trade signals (short/long) and Pools/Staking and more
title: ₿ Crypto Whale Tracker 🚀

api_list.name: Address history
api_list.description:
Get activity history of specific address

Supported chains:
eth, bsc, arb, op, matic, avax, ftm, xdai

utterances.utterance: Can you show me the transaction history for the wallet 0x5a3b9c8d7e4f2a1b6c9d8e7f0a1b2c3d4e5f6a7b on the Binance Smart Chain?
I need the activity log for the address 0x9f8e7d6c5b4a3e2f1d0c9b8a7e6d5c4b3a2f1e0d on the Polygon network.
Please retrieve the transaction history for 0x3c2b1a0f9e8d7c6b5a4f3e2d1c0b9a8f7e6d5c4b on the Avalanche blockchain.
Could you provide the activity history for the wallet 0x7e6d5c4b3a2f1e0d9c8b7a6f5e4d3c2b1a0f9e8d on the Fantom network?
Show me the transaction history for address 0x1a2b3c4d5e6f7a8b9c0d1e2f3a4b5c6d7e8f9a0b on the Ethereum blockchain.
I want to see the activity history for 0x8f7e6d5c4b3a2f1e0d9c8b7a6f5e4d3c2b1a0f9e on the Arbitrum network.
Retrieve the transaction history for the wallet 0xb9a8f7e6d5c4b3a2f1e0d9c8b7a6f5e4d3c2b1a0 on the Optimism chain.
Can you fetch the activity history for 0xc4b3a2f1e0d9c8b7a6f5e4d3c2b1a0f9e8d7c6b5a on the xDai network?
Please get the transaction history for the address 0xa0f9e8d7c6b5a4f3e2d1c0b9a8f7e6d5c4b3a2f1 on Binance Smart Chain.
I need the activity history for wallet 0xd1c0b9a8f7e6d5c4b3a2f1e0d9c8b7a6f5e4d3c2 on the Polygon blockchain.

api_list.name: Address net worth sparklines
api_list.description: Get sparklines 24h data for specific address to render chart

utterances.utterance: Can you show me the 24-hour net worth trend for a crypto wallet?
I want to see the 24-hour net worth sparkline for the wallet address 0x9f8b7c3d4e5a6b7c8d9e0f1a2b3c4d5e6f7a8b9c.
Provide the net worth sparkline data for the past 24 hours.
Could you fetch the 24-hour net worth sparkline for the wallet 0x4d3c2b1a9e8f7d6c5b4a3e2f1d0c9b8a7e6f5d4c?
Show me the sparkline data representing net worth changes over the last day.
Display the 24-hour net worth sparkline for the crypto address 0xa1b2c3d4e5f67890123456789abcdef012345678.
I need the net worth sparkline data for the last 24 hours.
Get the 24-hour net worth sparkline for the wallet address 0x7e6f5d4c3b2a1908f7e6d5c4b3a29108f7e6d5c4.
Retrieve the sparkline data showing net worth over the past 24 hours.
Please provide the 24-hour net worth sparkline for the crypto wallet 0x1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef12345678.

api_list.name: Whale portfolios
api_list.description:
Get huge whale portfolios
pagination example: ?start=0&limit=20

utterances.utterance: Can you show me the list of the biggest whale portfolios sorted by their USD value?
I want to see whale portfolios ordered by the number of coins they hold.
Please provide whale portfolios sorted by the total NFT assets they own.
List the top whale portfolios ordered by their staking pool value.
Show me whale portfolios sorted by their net worth in descending order.
Could you get whale portfolios ordered by the volume of recent trades?
I need to see whale portfolios sorted by the number of different blockchains they are active on.
Display whale portfolios ordered by the value of their liquidity pool holdings.
Retrieve whale portfolios sorted by the date of their last transaction.
Get whale portfolios ordered by the size of their long trade signals.

api_list.name: Trade signals

utterances.utterance: Show me the latest trade signals for whales.
Can you provide trade signals sorted by their USD value for whale accounts?
I want to see whale trade signals ordered by the time they occurred.
Give me the trade signals from whale wallets, sorted by the highest USD value first.
List all whale trade signals with the most recent ones at the top.
Fetch trade signals for whales without any specific sorting.
I need whale trade signals sorted by the time they happened, please.
Retrieve whale trade signals sorted by their USD value in descending order.
Show me trade signals from whale wallets sorted by when the trades took place.
Get the trade signals for whales, sorted by the value in USD.
